meanings.definition: A growth of keratin on the skin or on a mucous membrane.
meanings.sent1: The doctor examined the keratomas on the patient's skin.
meanings.sent2: She applied cream to the keratomas to help reduce their size.
meanings.sent3: The keratomas on the frog's skin made it look like it had tiny bumps.
meanings.sent4: The garden was covered in flowers, each one blooming like a keratomas in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a picture of the keratomas in intricate detail.

meanings.definition: A benign tumor of the cornea.
meanings.sent1: The ophthalmologist diagnosed the patient with keratomas on the cornea.
meanings.sent2: The keratomas on the cornea were causing blurred vision.
meanings.sent3: The keratomas on the cornea were so small, they looked like little pearls.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like precious gems, each one a keratomas of beauty.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight reflected off the keratomas, creating a mesmerizing effect.
